channel.title: Errors upgrading Qubes-Whonix Workstation to 15 (gnutls_handshake() failed) Can't Upgrade
channel.description:
> root@host:/home/user# apt-get-noninteractive dist-upgrade --no-install-recommends
As it says in the tutorial I enter the code above and then I get TONS of these error messages after
> 99% [Working]
since I got the errors before and now every time I try to upgrade
The error messages are like:
> `Err:2` [ `https ://deb.qubes-os dot org/r4.0/vm` ](https ://deb.qubes-os dot org/r4.0/vm) `buster/main amd64 pulseaudio-qubes amd64 4.0.24-1+deb10u1`
> `gnutls_handshake() failed: The TLS connection was non-properly terminated.`
Anyone have an idea on how to fix this? I can't reinstall for whatever reason (another error in Dom0).
Thanks
(Edited to remove links so the space in front of https and the dot is added by me, and I also posted this to the Whonix subreddit)

item.title: Errors upgrading Qubes-Whonix Workstation to 15 (gnutls_handshake() failed) Can't Upgrade
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
If the issue is transient, it can be safely ignored.

As per:

Whonix

Operating System Software and Updates

Operating System Software and Updates

item.title: Errors upgrading Qubes-Whonix Workstation to 15 (gnutls_handshake() failed) Can't Upgrade
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
I think you happened to be upgrading in a bad day for Qubes repos:

https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/qubes-devel/UcMtPj0i3uM

github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues

Issue: Add Whonix 15 WS & GW to qubes-templates-community

opened by TNTBOMBOM on 2019-07-03 
Qubes OS version
4.0.1
Affected component(s) or functionality
installing Whonix 15 templates
Brief summary
Add the installation ability of whonix 15 templates
To Reproduce
Run:
 sudo qubes-dom0-update --enablerepo=qubes-templates-community...
P: default T: bug

So the issue as i have tested now resolved. (use Qubes clearnet repo (default) if you didnt change to the onion repo)

Read full topic
item.source: Errors upgrading Qubes-Whonix Workstation to 15 (gnutls_handshake() failed) Can't Upgrade

item.description:
root@host:/home/user# apt-get-noninteractive dist-upgrade --no-install-recommends

As it says in the tutorial I enter the code above and then I get TONS of these error messages after

99% [Working]

since I got the errors before and now every time I try to upgrade

The error messages are like:

Err:2 [ https ://deb.qubes-os dot org/r4.0/vm ](https ://deb.qubes-os dot org/r4.0/vm) buster/main amd64 pulseaudio-qubes amd64 4.0.24-1+deb10u1

gnutls_handshake() failed: The TLS connection was non-properly terminated.

Anyone have an idea on how to fix this? I canâ€™t reinstall for whatever reason (another error in Dom0).

Thanks
